definitions: relating to a form of government in which possession of property is required in order to hold office

examples.text: the timocratic politics represented by Caesar

shortDefinitions: relating to form of government in which property is required to hold office

definitions: relating to a form of government in which rulers are motivated by ambition or love of honor

examples.text: the timocratic structure of divinity in early Greek myth

shortDefinitions: relating to form of government in which rulers are motivated by ambitionr
